dict.acceptation: 全部地；完全地；总共；总而言之；

sent.orig: Unfortunately, there is a proverb which says that 'red is either altogether good or altogether bad.'
sent.trans: 不幸的是，在我们那儿有句谚语，叫做‘脸蛋儿长得俊，不是好到极点，就是坏到透顶。’

sent.orig: Wickedness do not go altogether unrequired.
Captives are altogether at ease; They do not hear the voice of the taskmaster.
sent.trans: 18被囚的人同得安逸，听不见督工的声音。

sent.orig: You have me, I have you, the cooperation will altogether win creates the future!
sent.trans: 你有我，我有你，合作共赢创未来！

sent.orig: Entire document altogether 19 alone purely North America style big dwelling.
sent.trans: 全案共19栋独栋纯粹北美风格大宅。
